title: Steam's latest sale-fest is all about being sneaky
description: Steam's latest sale-fest is all about being sneaky. (And sometimes noisy, if that's your thing.)

title: The ESRB wants to start using facial recognition to check people's ages

description: No word on whether the 3D-printed copy has gained sentience yet.

title: My favorite offbeat roguelike of the decade is free to keep on Steam
description: Tower defense / roguelike hybrid Dungeon of the Endless is currently 100% off.

title: This new Humble Bundle has all the Myst except Pyst for just $20
description: If you've ever wanted to go all-in on the famous Myst games, here's your chance.

title: Tencent claims another one, will become 'majority shareholder' of Dying Light studio Techland
description: Techland says the deal will help ensure its new fantasy-action game lives up to expectations.

title: Remnant 2 has 'secrets within secrets within secrets' that not even the most hardcore players have found yet, says principal designer
description: 'I'm talking about hardcore players with over 400+ hours, reviewers that had early access, even our own internal developers. No one.'

description: Rest in peace, blue bird.

title: The most iconically awful E3 presentation has been uploaded in HD for the first time ever

title: Reddit is still a mess with r/place begging users to 'never forget what was stolen from us'
description: Reddark continues, with "the void" now taking over r/place.

title: I'm so relieved Baldur's Gate 3 doesn't have D&D's alignment system
